articles.title: Paytm slumps to new low as Macquarie sees risk from Ambani's financial foray - Economic Times
articles.description: Reliance Industries Ltd.s Jio Financial Services Ltd. “can pose a significant growth and market-share risk” for players such as Paytm and Bajaj Finance Ltd., Macquarie analysts led by Suresh Ganapathy wrote in a note on Monday.
